GAIA, Gatewatcher's advanced generative AI assistant, seamlessly integrates with its Network Detection and Response (NDR) solution, transforming how Security Operations Center (SOC) teams approach threat detection and incident analysis. By leveraging cutting-edge AI capabilities, GAIA empowers SOC teams to enhance efficiency, accuracy, and response times in combating cyber threats. 

Learn more at: https://www.gatewatcher.com/en/product/gaia
